entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as one of the people whose features are changing, specifically her hair appearing to shoot backward into her skull.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is described as one of the people whose features are changing, shooting upward.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as one of the people whose features are changing, shrinking in size.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as one of the people whose features are changing, shrinking in size and turning to George to comment on their identical appearance.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as one of the people whose features are changing, shrinking in size and turning to Fred to comment on their identical appearance.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as one of the people whose hair appears to shoot backward into her skull.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as a person who is unconcerned and loosening ties on sacks he brought with him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as one of the people whose features are changing, specifically there being six Harry Potters in front of Moody.

relationships.description: Fred and George comment on their identical appearance together, saying 'Wow — we’re identical!'
Moody creates six Harry Potters in front of him.
